comments.body: why not inline the ColoredBox build function here? That seems like a more likely pattern that authors will follow, since they'll have lots of different types of children. I don't think most cases will lend themselves well to having a ColoredBox-style wrapper.

> why not inline the ColoredBox build function here?

I had that originally but it was getting a bit verbose.  I can put it back that way if you prefer.
Either way is fine. We may have to find a more scalable way to reduce the verbosity though.
